name: Class FileChooserUI
text: Pluggable look and feel interface for JFileChooser.
codes:
public abstract class FileChooserUI
extends ComponentUI

methods.method_sig:
public abstract void ensureFileIsVisible (JFileChooser fc,
                                         File f)
methods.description: Ensure the file in question is visible.

Returns default button for current LookAndFeel.
 JFileChooser will use this button as default button
 for dialog windows.
